cause.description:
The Lupus Foundation of America Southeastern PA chapter is dedicated to raising community and physician awareness in the southeastern region of Pennsylvania including Berks, Bucks, Chester, Delaware, Montgomery and Philadelphia counties and the surrounding areas.
Some of our services include:
o Support groups throughout the Southeast PA region o Educational seminars o Peer-counseling o A self-help course for people living with lupus and their families o Emergency financial assistance for people with lupus o Assistance with navigating the health care system o Outreach to medically underserved communities o Continuing medical education for health professionals and physicians o An advocacy program at the state and national levels to increase public funding for lupus research, education and patient services, and to foster public policies that help people with lupus and their families o Sponsorship of media campaigns designed to educate the public and raise awareness
1. improve the diagnosis and treatment of lupus, support individuals and families affected by the disease, increase awareness of lupus among health professionals and the public, and find the causes and a cure.
cause.name: Lupus Foundation of America- Southeastern PA Chapter
